name: Cloudflare DDNS
description: Cloudflare DDNS is a feature-rich dynamic DNS client for Cloudflare, designed to keep your domain's DNS records up-to-date with your current IP address.
longDescription: A feature-rich and robust Cloudflare DDNS updater with a small footprint. The program will detect your machineâ€™s public IP addresses and update DNS records using the Cloudflare API.
